Class UserInputSystem

java.lang.Object
Managers.UserInputSystem
public class UserInputSystem extends Object
Manages user input handling, responding to key presses for player movement and actions. Integrates with the game scene and user plane to provide real-time control. Source Code: GitHub Link

    • InputSystem

      public void InputSystem()
      Initializes the input system by setting up event listeners for key presses and releases. Manages user movement and actions like shooting, pausing, and resuming the game.
